title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: Pressing the Delete button deletes the first item on the second row. When the delete occurs, the second row is removed completely instead of remaining intact.
EB: Pressing the Delete button should only delete the first item on the second row. The second row should remain after the delete occurs.
SR:
1. Open the Coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Verify that the first item on the second row is deleted.
4. Verify that the second row remains intact.
